bao.player

Class BaoPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • bao.player.BaoPlayer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AIPlayer, HumanPlayer

    public abstract class BaoPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines an abstract Bao player, which is fully implemented by HumanPlayer and AI Player
    Author:
    Regan Koopmans

      • BaoPlayer

        public BaoPlayer(BaoBoard board,
                 PlayerType playerType)
        Constructor for BaoPlayer.
        Parameters:
        board - the board that this player will bind to and play on.
        playerType - the type of player (Player1/Player2) that the player will play as.

      • getDirection

        public abstract Direction getDirection()

      • nextTurn

        public void nextTurn()
        Function that controls the structure of a Bao turn, and directs behaviour based on the type of turn that is occuring. The concept of a turn is fixed for both Human and AI players, and hence can be described abstractly, and only the method of obtaining moves directions can be specified for concrete Bao players.

        public void attachOpponent(BaoPlayer opponent)
